tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Game continued to round into shape late in the season. After a T20 at the Chongqing Jiangnan NewTown KingRun Open, returned to the Nine Dragons Open a year after finishing a career-best T11 at Nine Dragons GC. Had a disappointing 76-73 (5-over) start but then caught fire on the weekend, shooting scores of 68-69 to match the T11 from a year earlier. 

2014: Opened his season with a 77th-place performance at the Buick Open in April…In his next start, at the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open, shot a final-round, even-par 72 to T44…Next made cut didn't come until the late-summer, when he T63 at the Cadillac Championship…Added a T48 at the Jianye Tianzhu Henan Open…Enjoyed his best outing on PGA TOUR China when he T11 at the Nine Dragons Open in mid-November. Had a solid first round at the difficult Nine Dragons GC, making four birdies and an eagle on his way to a 2-under 70. Added an even-par 72 in the third round and eventually finished T11 for a ￥31,200 payday, the largest of his PGA TOUR China career.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 11th on the PGA Tour China Serie 2 times.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 83rd in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
